rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0001
rows.name:
Superbia is all rocky terrain
and barren land. It's
exhausting to walk through!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0002
rows.name: Let's rest here a bit.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0003
rows.name: Yay!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0004
rows.name: You're being a bit of a wimp, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0005
rows.name:
Tora has been cooped up at home,
absorbed in making Hana, so I'm not
used to walking long distances.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0006
rows.name:
It looks so much easier to
fly around like Gramps does.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0007
rows.name:
You've got those big
ear things, don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0008
rows.name:
These aren't for flying! No matter
how much I flap them, I can't fly!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0009
rows.name:
If walking is too tough, how about
asking Byakko to carry you?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0010
rows.name: That's a great idea!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0011
rows.name:
I must decline. I have sworn not to
carry anyone except for my lady.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0012
rows.name: Why don't you let him ride?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0013
rows.name: Huh!?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0014
rows.name: My lady, are you okay with that!?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0015
rows.name:
If I let Tora ride me, soon Hana
will want to join him, and then
there will be no space left for you!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0016
rows.name:
When you phrase it like that,
I don't know what to say...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0017
rows.name:
I guess you can't ride
Byakko after all, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0018
rows.name: How disappointing...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0019
rows.name: You doing alright, Homura?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0020
rows.name: I'm fine.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0021
rows.name: ...But the sand dust bothers me.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0022
rows.name:
Yeah, that's rough. Especially
when it gets in your eyes...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0023
rows.name: Hana doesn't like that either.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0024
rows.name:
The tiny sand particles get
into my joints and make
them creak when I move!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0025
rows.name:
When we get back, I'll need Masterpon
to do a thorough cleaning.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0026
rows.name: Boss...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0027
rows.name:
Superbia is really tough to travel
and causing problems for everyone.
Any ideas what we should do?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0028
rows.name: Well, let's see...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0029
rows.name: How should we deal with this?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0030
rows.name: Offer my salvager suits to everyone.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0031
rows.name: Just tough it out.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0101
rows.name: How about wearing my salvage suits?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0102
rows.name:
That would certainly keep
sand out of our eyes.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0103
rows.name:
I have a spare, so I'll lend
it to you. Want to try it on?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0104
rows.name: Though size-wise only Nia can wear it.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0105
rows.name: Fine, I'll give it a try.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0106
rows.name:
If this solves the problem, we
can get suits for everyone.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0107
rows.name:
My lady... you look
surprisingly good in that.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0108
rows.name: Shut up!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0109
rows.name:
So this is what it's like for
Rex when he goes salvaging.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0110
rows.name:
It keeps the sand out
pretty well, doesn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0111
rows.name: It does, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0112
rows.name:
...but I can barely see anything.
The visibility is terrible!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0113
rows.name:
And it's really difficult
to move around in.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0114
rows.name: Wouldn't this make combat impossible?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0115
rows.name:
Yeah, I don't think I could
fight effectively like this.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0116
rows.name:
Sorry Boss... your
idea didn't work out.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0117
rows.name: So it didn't work after all.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0201
rows.name: So it comes down to willpower?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0202
rows.name: Don't you want to solve the problem?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0203
rows.name:
Well, listening to you all talk
about it made me realize that the
sand is indeed an issue, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0204
rows.name:
But then I also realized that
I hadn't even noticed it until
you all mentioned it.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0205
rows.name:
It's not affecting our combat,
is it? I think we're fighting
just as well as always.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0206
rows.name:
It's annoying, sure, but it's
not actually hindering us.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0207
rows.name: ...I suppose you're right.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0208
rows.name:
Yeah, I guess it's not
actually slowing me down.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0209
rows.name:
See? So if we just power through
and ignore it, we'll be fine!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0210
rows.name:
You're right! I'll try
not to let it bother me.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0211
rows.name: I'll try to ignore it too.

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0212
rows.name: Okay! Let's power through this!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0213
rows.name: Right!

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0214
rows.name: Is this really okay?

rows.label: kizunatalk031_msg0215
rows.name: Yeah.
